PHRASE.LANG: kName
Fairytale Mr Muffet's Jaunty Top Hat
Haut de forme désinvolte de Mr Muffet Fairytales
Märchen-Mr-Muffet-Zylinder
Cilindro sbarazzino di Mr Muffet delle fiabe
Sombrero alto alegre del Sr. Mufete del cuento

kDesc
The brave Mr Muffet chased away the scary spider and won Ms Muffet's heart, not that you ever hear about that in the famous rhyme...\n Concept by PlayStation®Home user Jennifer Whitbread.\n [#Legal]

Le courageux Mr Muffet a chassé la terrifiante araignée et remporté le coeur de Miss Muffet, bien que le fameux poème ne nous dise rien à ce sujet…\n Concept de l'utilisateur du PlayStation®Home, Jennifer Whitbread.\n [#Legal]

Der tapfere Mr. Muffet verjagte die böse Spinne und eroberte so das Herz von Ms. Muffet, doch das erfährt man im berühmten Kinderreim nicht ...\n Konzept von PlayStation®Home-Nutzerin Jennifer Whitbread.\n [#Legal]

Il coraggioso Mr Muffet ha scacciato via il ragno spaventoso, conquistando il cuore di Ms Muffet, ma di certo conoscerai la famosa filastrocca...\n Ideato dall'utente PlayStation®Home Jennifer Whitbread.\n [#Legal]

El valiente Sr. Mufete ahuyentó a la temible araña y se ganó el corazón de la Srta. Mufete, aunque eso nunca se dijo en el cuento clásico...\n Idea original de la usuaria de PlayStation®Home Jennifer Whitbread.\n [#Legal]
The brave Mr Muffet chased away the scary spider and won Ms Muffet's heart, not that you ever hear about that in the famous rhyme...\n Concept by PlayStation®Home user Jennifer Whitbread.\n [#Legal]
